revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Team Flare Secret HQ |image = [[File:Team Flare Secret HQ.png|250px]] |caption = A map of Team Flare Secret HQ. |tokens = 675,000 |location = Geosenge Town }} '''Team Flare Secret HQ''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kalos]]. It initially has 100 tiles arranged in a 10x10 square, including 10 chest tiles, 23 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
== Random Encounters ==
